articles.title: What Juan Mata said about the possibility of Manchester City signing Lionel Messi - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester United's Spanish midfielder was quizzed on what he thinks about the Argentine superstar potentially heading to their bitter rivals.
articles.content:
Manchester United midfielder Juan Mata is praying Lionel Messi doesn't end up across town at Manchester City.
The Argentine superstar has been linked on many occasions with a move to England.
